org.apache.sshd.server.auth.pubkey

Interface PublickeyAuthenticator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcceptAllPublickeyAuthenticator, AuthorizedKeysAuthenticator, CachingPublicKeyAuthenticator, DefaultAuthorizedKeysAuthenticator, KeySetPublickeyAuthenticator, RejectAllPublickeyAuthenticator, StaticPublickeyAuthenticator

    public interface PublickeyAuthenticator
    The PublickeyAuthenticator is used on the server side to authenticate user public keys.
    Author:
    Apache MINA SSHD Project

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean authenticate(String username, PublicKey key, ServerSession session)
      Check the validity of a public key.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        boolean authenticate(String username,
                     PublicKey key,
                     ServerSession session)
        Check the validity of a public key.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        key - the key
        session - the server session
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if authentication succeeded or not
